remarks: Conjugate of an inner product in a complex pre-Hilbert space.  Complex version of ~ ipcj .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphipcj.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
cphipcj.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cphipcj $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( * ` ( A ., B ) ) = ( B ., A ) ) $.
